column5: Some lakes have lots more than others.

get something like lake fork baby ring fry or creature bait. You can lay that hook right into the rings and it makes it very effective in weeds. I fish private pond all summer that is chock full of weeds, and its the only way i can fish it. I still lose too many fish when they go down into weeds but that's another story.
https://youtu.be/dhUy9yEDeUsFor all you guys he√†ded to North Star Lodge.Water going to be high and walleyes will be in the bush.Should be solid fishing.
It will be solid alright when they set the hook on a pine tree log.
Yup,it's always exciting when you set the hook on something solid,,,,it's like OH BOY!!! Here we go.But most the time the only thing that goes is your jig,,,Gone.
Last August at Ogoki reservoir ,My sister & I had Many settings of Hooks into all kinds of wood. We probably lost over 50 jigs and other lures Larry S
That be a good spot to open a tackle shop.
Would suggest to anyone that fishes in wooded/rock areas or weeds to go with a good weedless jig which will save you a lot of jigs.
Or don't go to a lake where you have fish in timber,that's what I would do.
Eck.i havnt found a lake yet in NWO that doesn't have rocks,weeds,timber and sunken timber yet.
